import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {Link, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import productBig1 from '../img/shop-details/product-big.png' import productBig2 from '../img/shop-details/product-big-2.png' import productBig3 from '../img/shop-details/product-big-3.png' import productBig4 from '../img/shop-details/product-big-4.png' import detailsPayment from "../img/shop-details/details-payment.png" const ShopDetailSection = () => { const location = useLocation(); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const currentLanguage = location.pathname.split('/')[1] || 'en'; useEffect(() => { document.querySelectorAll('.set-bg').forEach((element) => { const bg = element.getAttribute('data-setbg'); element.style.backgroundImage = `url(${bg})`; }); }, []); return (
